name: Surfer Game - Catch the Wave
description:
Banzai!! Surf’s Up!! Time to shoot the curl. Cowabunga!

Get your baggies on, grab your board, and catch the wave! Collect sports medals and conch shells to unlock new characters, even Kyle the Wonder Dog!

HOW TO PLAY
Tilt the screen left or right to make the surfer turn. Avoid obstacles like other surfers and collect medals

- Fun game
- Exciting surfing
- Cool music

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘The Surfer Game’ Now!!!
